meanings.definition: A person who supports or approves of something, typically by signing or endorsing a document.
meanings.sent1: The endorsee of the petition was happy to sign it.
meanings.sent2: The endorsee of the contract agreed to the terms.
meanings.sent3: The endorsee of the letter smiled as they put their signature.
meanings.sent4: She was the endorsee of kindness, always ready to support others.
meanings.sent5: The endorsee, with a smile, showed their approval by signing.
